attributes.action: Give control back to the people with a Brexit referendum containing 2 questions.
attributes.additional_details:
Firstly Q1 do you want to leave or remain in the European
Q2 in the case of another leave majority, do you want to leave with a deal or with no deal? 
The result of the second question would only be relevant in the case of a leave majority, but would give everyone regardless of whether they voted leave or remain a say on how Brexit should be handled.
Brexit needs to stop being treated like a political party policy. Everyone should be free to vote with their heart not the colour of their party.
attributes.background: MPs have been trying and failing to agree what Brexit should look like and how to get it done for years. We are now armed with plenty of information on the pros and cons of Brexit and as such It's time to go back to the  people and let us decide with a second referendum consisting 2 questions.
